documents.title: Artificial Intelligence
documents.summary: What AI is and how it is used.
documents.content: Artificial Intelligence is the field of creating machines that can think, learn, and adapt. It includes machine learning, deep learning, and neural networks. AI is used in vision, language processing, robotics, healthcare, and automation.

documents.title: Robotics
documents.summary: Basics of robotics and autonomous systems.
documents.content: Robotics combines mechanics, electronics, and software to create machines that sense, think, and act. Robots use sensors, motors, controllers, and algorithms for navigation, decision-making, and automation.

documents.title: ESPHome & IoT
documents.content: ESPHome is used to create smart IoT devices using ESP microcontrollers. It supports sensors, Wi-Fi, OTA updates, MQTT, and automation rules. It is perfect for smart homes and experiments.
